      • updatesWaitingSlotsToReady

        public void updatesWaitingSlotsToReady()
                                throws java.lang.Exception
        Create a workflow with a hourly schedule and an always trigger. Step the workflow a single time. Ensure that all hourly slots have been changed to ready.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • doesNotUpdateWaitingSlotsToReadyWhenNoDataAvailability

        public void doesNotUpdateWaitingSlotsToReadyWhenNoDataAvailability()
                                                            throws java.lang.Exception
        Create a workflow with a hourly schedule and a never trigger. Step the workflow a single time. Ensure that no hourly slots have been changed to ready, and in fact, that no slots have been updated in the database.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • leavesRunningSlotsAsIsIfStillRunning

        public void leavesRunningSlotsAsIsIfStillRunning()
                                          throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates running slots in memory database, with mock external service that always says the external jobs are still running. Makes sure that the slots are still marked as running after step.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • marksRunningSlotsAsSuccessfulIfExternalStatusIsSuccess

        public void marksRunningSlotsAsSuccessfulIfExternalStatusIsSuccess()
                                                            throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates running slots in memory database, with mock external service that always says the external jobs are successful. Makes sure that the slots are marked as successful after step.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • marksRunningSlotsAsFailedIfExternalStatusIsFailure

        public void marksRunningSlotsAsFailedIfExternalStatusIsFailure()
                                                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates running slots in memory database, with mock external service that always says the external jobs are failed. Makes sure that the slots are marked as failed after step.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • updatesReadySlotsToRunningAndSubmitsThemToExternalSystem

        public void updatesReadySlotsToRunningAndSubmitsThemToExternalSystem()
                                                              throws java.lang.Exception,
                                                                     java.lang.AssertionError
        Creates ready slots in memory database. Uses trivial scheduling strategy so all ready slots will be used. Makes sure all are running after step, and have been submitted to external service.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        java.lang.AssertionError

      • multipleSlotsTest

        public void multipleSlotsTest()
                       throws java.lang.Exception
        Use a serial scheduling strategy. Create one waiting and two ready slots. Make sure that after a step: - the waiting slot is ready - the first ready slot is running - the second ready slot is still ready - the running slot's external ID matches the one handed out by the mock external service
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • workflowStartTimeTest

        public void workflowStartTimeTest()
                           throws java.lang.Exception
        Create a workflow with a start time 3 days in the past. Run scheduler for past 7 days. Ensure that only slots for the past three days have been created in the DB.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • retryTest

        public void retryTest()
               throws java.lang.Exception
        Set up workflow with max retry count of 10. Use repeatedly failing external service that fails 2 times. Ensure that slot is rerun 2 times and then moves to success state.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • retryTestWithTooSmallMaxRetryCount

        public void retryTestWithTooSmallMaxRetryCount()
                                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Set up workflow with max retry count of 2. Use repeatedly failing external service that fails 3 times. Ensure that slot is rerun 2 (max retry count) times and then moves to failure state.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • schedulingOnlySubsetOfWorkflowsWorks

        public void schedulingOnlySubsetOfWorkflowsWorks()
                                          throws java.lang.Exception
        Set up two identical workflows but tell scheduler to only schedule the first one. Check that second workflow's slot is not touched and stays in WAITING.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
